explains: adj. 有抱负的，野心勃勃的；费劲的，艰巨的；热望的

sentences.en: For socially ambitious couples this is a problem.
sentences.cn: 对在社会地位方面有野心的夫妇来说，这是个问题。

sentences.en: Chris is so ambitious, so determined to do it all.
sentences.cn: 克里斯是如此雄心勃勃，如此坚决地要把它做完。

sentences.en: He has always been ambitious and fiercely competitive.
sentences.cn: 他一直都野心勃勃，极其争强好斗。
